column4: Is this a kernel panic? Heaps of lines like: [ 1130.650856]  [<c0109f02>] sysenter_do_call+0x12/0x2f
a kernel panic is when a kernel panics. i.e. blinking keyboard lights, no response. what you get is prolly a kernel bug.
or an application causing a kernel bug, which generally means a kernel bug :)
